title: Arcadia Nights – Live in the Moment
description: Captured amid flying confetti and electric blue stage lights, this frame freezes the raw energy of Nakash Aziz performing live at Arcadia, our college fest. The silhouettes of the crowd and the dramatic lighting amplify the emotion of the moment, turning a live performance into a timeless memory of music, movement, and celebration.
image: e magazine AOT/Sumit/1.jpg

title: Frames Within Frames – Train Street, Hanoi
description: A bustling moment at Hanoi Train Street, where everyday life pauses for the spectacle of the tracks. Raised phones mirror the same scene from multiple perspectives, creating a layered narrative of travel, curiosity, and modern tourism against a traditional urban backdrop.
image: e magazine AOT/Sumit/2.jpg

title: A Walk Through Old Europe – French Village, Ba Na Hills
description: Cobblestone streets, stone façades, and festive décor come together at the French Village. This image captures the charm of European architecture recreated in the hills, blending heritage aesthetics with lively tourist energy and a calm, immersive atmosphere.
image: e magazine AOT/Sumit/3.jpg
